clinical_history: Pelvic pain with suspected ovarian pathology.
technique: Real-time gray-scale and color Doppler imaging performed.
findings: Soft tissue region demonstrates ill-defined without fluid collection.
Urinary bladder is coarse, no intraluminal lesions.
Breast tissue shows hypoechoic lesion measuring 35.85 mm.
Prostate is coarse; volume approximately 10.12 cc.
Major vessels show isoechoic waveform on Doppler.
Left kidney shows isoechoic, corticomedullary differentiation preserved.
recommendations: Refer to specialist for further evaluation.
